title: Game not launching after clicking launch [Win 7]
body: I've repaired my game and it fixed it for that specific time. After I reboot my pc the same problem occurs. As of matter a fact, it occurs every time I close league of legends. I've tried deleting Lol_air_client and config; It fixes it until I try restarting my client then the same problem happens.

replies.body:
Launching issues like this tend to happen if League is missing specific admin privileges it really needs to run properly. I suggest diving into our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps that commonly resolve this type of issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
